title: Saturday 19th September 2015
content:
4677/17336 
A lovely afternoon, ostensibly working at the Greenwich Festival, but not only did I get to perform a fun 25 minutes of material whilst mildly tipsy to 1000 or so people, I also hung out backstage with some really cool comedians like Adam Buxton, Sara Pascoe, John Robbins, Nick Helm, Roisin Conaty and Nish Kumar, but also my wife and daughter.
